segments.text: I notice the woman by the sink, completely focused on drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't realized that the sink is overflowing, water spilling onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the children behind her, quietly trying to get some cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on a stool, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching him balance precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman will be surprised when she finally notices the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so serene, contrasting with the tension inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children get their cookies before the woman turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bit funny to see them being so sneaky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long they can keep this up without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
